name: Groupme DarkDru
description:
A dark and slightly modular style for GroupMe's new layout @ web.groupme.com

Organized for customization.
Layout is centered, delete the contents of the centering section in the css for left-alignment.

DOES NOT WORK @ APP.GROUPME.COM
additional_info:
v1.0.0 | 7.24.15 – First release
v1.0.1 | 7.29.15 – Updated style on the "view event" calendar section
v1.0.2 | 9.4.15 – Fixed invisible nicknames and timestamp divider background color
v1.0.3 | 9.10.15 – Corrected more new css nesting and added styles for the sign in page and badge notifications
v1.0.4 | 9.11.15 – More css nesting fixes
v1.0.5 | 9.22.15 – Fixed for new update
v1.0.6 | 12.10.15 – Fixed for new update
